transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Harender baat kar raha hu sir.

Executive: Ji ji sir.

Customer: Package chala mera IndiaMART pe, Harinder Mart ke naam se.

Executive: Ji ji sir.

Customer: To sir lead me dikkat aa rahi hai mujhe. Maine pehle complaint ki thi to to theek aayi thi beech mein fir dikkat hone lagi Diwali ke baad.

Executive: Okay. To sir actually aaj jo hai na hamara off hai. Main aapse Monday connect kar lu sir agar aap allow karo to.

Customer: Koi dikkat nahi sir.

Executive: Theek hai. Monday Monday connect jarur kar lijiye aap theek hai is tarike se. For sure for sure sir. Sure main aapko connect karta hu.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with buyleads after Diwali.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that today is an off day.
- Executive will connect on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, package, support
